name: mlNikon's Philmeister
description:
Simple tasty watermelon peach recipe made for this week's on mixin vixens. I heard Phil B likes watermelon peach mixes so I made this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WHJyrTBZnto&feature=youtu.be

If you would like to support us in a fun and tasty way, check out our one shot line at flavour jungle!
